snippet: Martellus Bennett is looking forward to catching passes from Tom Brady and teaming with another talented tight end in All-Pro Rob Gronkowski....
lead_paragraph: Martellus Bennett is looking forward to catching passes from Tom Brady and teaming with another talented tight end in All-Pro Rob Gronkowski.

headline.main: Patriots Acquire Tight End Bennett in Trade With Bears
headline.print_headline: Patriots Acquire Tight End Bennett in Trade With Bears
